Verses: 1 karththarin Kirubaigalai Endrendraikkum Paaduven; Umadhu Unmaiyaith Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga En Vaayinaal Arivippen.
2 kirubai Endrendraikkum Sthirappattirukkum; Umadhu Unmaiyai Vaanangalile Sthaabippeer Endren.
3 ennaal Therindhukollappattavanode Udanpadikkaipanni, En Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhai Nokki:
4 endrendraikkum Un Sandhadhiyai Nilaippaduththi, Thalaimurai Thalaimuraiyaaga Un Singaasanaththai Sthaabippen Endru Aanaiyitten Endreer. (selaa.)
5 karththaave, Vaanangal Ummudaiya Adhisayangalaith Thudhikkum, Parisuththavaangalin Sabaiyile Ummudaiya Unmaiyum Vilangum.
6 aagaayamandalaththil Karththarukku Nigaraanavar Yaar? Balavaangalin Puththiraril Karththarukku Oppaanavar Yaar?
7 dhevan Parisuththavaangaludaiya Aalosanaich Sabaiyil Migavum Bayappadaththakkavar, Thammaich Soozhndhirukkira Anaivaraalum Anjappadaththakkavar.
8 senaigalin Dhevanaagiya Karththaave, Ummaippol Vallamaiyulla Karththar Yaar? Ummudaiya Unmai Ummaich Soozhndhirukkiradhu.
9 dhevareer Samuththiraththin Perumaiyai Aalugiravar; Adhin Alaigal Ezhumbumpothu Avaigalai Adangappannugireer.
10 neer Raagaabai Vettunda Oruvanaippol Norukkineer; Umadhu Vallamaiyaana Puyaththinaal Ummudaiya Saththurukkalaich Sidharadiththeer.
11 vaanangal Ummudaiyadhu, Boomiyum Ummudaiyadhu, Poologaththaiyum Adhilulla Yaavaiyum Neere Asthibaarappaduththineer.
12 vadakkaiyum Therkaiyum Neer Undaakkineer; Thaaporum Ermonum Ummudaiya Naamam Vilangak Gembeerikkum.
13 umakku Vallamaiyulla Puyamirukkiradhu; Ummudaiya Karam Baraakkiramamulladhu; Ummudaiya Valadhukaram Unnadhamaanadhu.
14 needhiyum Niyaayamum Ummudaiya Singaasanaththin Aadhaaram; Kirubaiyum Saththiyamum Umakku Munbaaga Nadakkum.
15 gempeerasaththaththai Ariyum Janangal Baakkiyamullavargal; Karththaave, Avargal Ummudaiya Mugaththin Velichchaththil Nadappaargal.
16 avargal Ummudaiya Naamaththil Naadorum Kalikoorndhu, Ummudaiya Needhiyaal Uyarndhiruppaargal.
17 neere Avargal Balaththin Magimaiyaayirukkireer; Ummudaiya Thayavinaal Engal Kombu Uyarum.
18 karththaraal Engal Kedagamum, Isravelin Parisuththaraal Engaludaiya Raajaavum Undu.
19 appozhudhu Neer Ummudaiya Bagthanukkuth Dharisanamaagi: Sagaayanseyyaththakka Sakthiyai Oru Savuriyavaanmel Vaiththu, Janaththil Therindhukollappattavanai Uyarththinen.
20 en Dhaasanaagiya Dhaaveedhaik Kandupidiththen; En Parisuththa Thailaththinaal Avanai Abishegampanninen.
21 en Kai Avanode Urudhiyaayirukkum; En Puyam Avanaip Balappaduththum.
22 saththuru Avanai Nerukkuvadhillai; Niyaayakkettin Magan Avanai Odukkuvadhillai.
23 avan Saththurukkalai Avanukku Munbaaga Madangadiththu, Avanaip Pagaikkiravargalai Vettuven.
24 en Unmaiyum En Kirubaiyum Avanodirukkum; En Naamaththinaal Avan Kombu Uyarum.
25 avan Kaiyaich Samuththiraththinmelum, Avan Valadhukaraththai Aarugalmelum Aalumpadi Vaippen.
26 avan Ennai Nokki: Neer En Pidhaa, En Dhevan, En Ratchippin Kanmalaiyendru Solluvaan.
27 naan Avanai Enakku Mudharperaanavanum, Boomiyin Raajaakkalaip Paarkkilum Magaa Uyarndhavanumaakkuven.
28 en Kirubaiyai Endrendraikkum Avanukkaagak Kaappen; En Udanpadikkai Avanukkaaga Urudhippaduththappadum.
29 avan Sandhadhi Endrendraikkum Nilaiththirukkavum, Avan Raajaasanam Vaanangalullamattum Nilainirkavum Seyven.
30 avan Pillaigal En Niyaayangalinpadi Nadavaamal, En Vedhaththai Vittu Vilagi;
31 en Kattalaigalaik Kaikkollaamal, En Niyamangalai Meerinadandhaal;
32 avargal Meerudhalai Milaatrinaalum, Avargal Akkiramaththai Vaadhaigalinaalum Thandippen.
33 aanaalum En Kirubaiyai Avanaivittu Vilakkaamalum, En Unmaiyil Pisagaamalum Iruppen.
34 en Udanpadikkaiyai Meeraamalum, En Udhadugal Vilambinadhai Maatraamalum Iruppen.
35 oruvisai En Parisuththaththinperil Aanaiyitten, Dhaaveedhukku Naan Poisollen.
36 avan Sandhadhi Endrendraikkum Irukkum; Avan Singaasanam Sooriyanaippola Enakku Munbaaga Nilainirkum.
37 sandhiranaippola Adhu Endrendraikkum Urudhiyaayum, Aagaayamandalaththuch Saatchiyaippol Unmaiyaayum Irukkum Endru Vilambineer. (selaa.)
38 aanaalum Neer Engalai Veruththuth Thallivitteer; Neer Abishegampannuviththavanmel Ukkiramaaneer.
39 umadhu Adiyaanudan Neer Pannina Udanpadikkaiyai Ozhiththuvittu, Avan Kireedaththaith Tharaiyile Thalli Avamaanappaduththineer.
40 avan Madhilgalaiyellaam Thagarththuppottu, Avan Aranaana Sthalangalaip Paazhaakkineer.
41 vazhinadakkira Yaavarum Avanaik Kollaiyidugiraargal; Than Ayalaarukku Nindhaiyaanaan.
42 avan Saththurukkalin Valadhukaiyai Neer Uyarththi, Avan Virodhigal Yaavarum Sandhoshikkumpadi Seydheer.
43 avan Pattayaththin Karukkai Mazhukkippottu, Avanai Yuththaththil Nirkaadhapadi Seydheer.
44 avan Magimaiyai Atruppogappanni, Avan Singaasanaththaith Tharaiyile Thallineer.
45 avan Vaalibanaatkalaik Kurukki, Avanai Vetkaththaal Moodineer. (selaa.)
46 edhuvaraikkum, Karththaave! Neer Endraikkum Maraindhiruppeero? Umadhu Kobam Akkiniyaippola Eriyumo?
47 en Jeevan Evvalavu Nilaiyatradhu Enbadhai Ninaiththarulum; Manupuththirar Yaavaraiyum Veenaagach Sirushtikka Vendiyadhenna?
48 maranaththaik Kaanaamal Uyirodiruppavan Yaar? Than Aaththumaavaip Paadhaala Valladikku Vilakkividugiravan Yaar? (selaa.)
49 aandavare, Neer Dhaaveedhukku Ummudaiya Unmaiyaikkondu Saththiyampannina Umadhu Poorva Kirubaigal Enge?
50 aandavare, Ummudaiya Saththurukkal Ummudaiya Oozhiyakkaararaiyum, Neer Abishegampanninavanin Kaaladigalaiyum Nindhikkirapadiyinaal,
51 karththaave, Umadhu Adiyaar Sumakkum Nindhaiyaiyum, Valumaiyaana Janangalellaaraalum Naan En Madiyil Sumakkum En Nindhaiyaiyum Ninaiththarulum.
52 karththarukku Endrendraikkum Sthoththiramundaavadhaaga. Aamen, Aamen.
